text: Young Man with Ideas is a 1952 American romantic comedy movie directed by Mitchell Leisen and starring Ruth Roman, Glenn Ford, Nina Foch, Denise Darcel, Roy Collins, Sheldon Leonard. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Mitchell Leisen
title: Young Man with Ideas
